Html:
Hi, this is my first post here, and I'm working with excel templates to fill with some data...

My deal is whit a particular case, in template I have some images that are set to "not printables" (are just for visual reference). The problem is when I get the new excel generated with that template, all the image's properties are "resetted", so all the images are in "printable" mode.

There is a way to set back this "particular" property?

 

Thanks
